metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28601 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A code execution vulnerability exists in the Nef polygon-parsing functionality of CGAL libcgal CGAL-5.1.1. An oob read vulnerability exists in Nef_2/PM_io_parser.h PM_io_parser::read_vertex() Face_of[] OOB read. An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-28601` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcgal-demo - 5.2-3
libcgal-ipelets - 5.2-3
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> possible regression introduced by fix, see GH issue 5514

criterions.comment: cgal package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2-3').
